alert.note: Alert for Des Moines (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 22 at 10:40AM CDT until May 26 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Illinois...Iowa... Mississippi River at Keithsburg affecting Des Moines, Mercer, Henderson and Louisa Counties. Mississippi River at Burlington affecting Hancock, Des Moines, Lee and Henderson Counties. Mississippi River at Gladstone LD18 affecting Des Moines and Henderson Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Mississippi River at Gladstone LD18. * WHEN...Until Friday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM CDT Monday the stage was 11.0 feet and falling. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage early Thursday afternoon. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. The next statement will be issued this evening.
